Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2013 01:31PM nalaki20 wrote: Praying for bravery and good results! Hang in there. Waiting is terrible, I know. I'm waiting for results too. This is a great place to find support and encouragement. Just remember that the odds really are in your favor!
Posts.Title: Waiting! anastaisa99 nalaki20

Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2013 11:12PM nalaki20 wrote: I had the exact same thing a few months ago. One breast had a clear discharge and I felt a lump. Waiting for test results was the hardest part. My lump was quite large and I ended up having two surgeries to make sure it was all removed. I'm 27 so I was quite worried that something was really wrong. Everything turned out to be benign. The surgeries weren't too bad and I was pretty much pain free a week later. And no more discharge!  I know the waiting is scary - but be strong. Remember that the odds are in your favor. And no matter what, there are great people here to support you. Hoping you get great results!
